Just like how Robert Downey Jr is witty in the Marvel cinematic universe, he is also known for his jokes in real life as well - -especially on social media. And it is no surprise that he often cracks a joke on his beloved friend Chris Evans.

But they both love each other to the core, we all know.
Happy Valentine’s Day to all the shippers out there! ❤️😉 pic.twitter.com/VAVwRLDumo — Robert Downey Jr (@RobertDowneyJr) February 14, 2018
But did you know Robert Downey Jr once gifted his pal Chris Evans a customised 1967 Chevrolet Camaro, which features Captain America's shield at the centre of the steering wheel. How cool is that, right?
What’s more? The car’s estimated value is $275,000, which roughly amounts to Rs 2 crores in Indian currency. Chris Evans shared the news when he appeared on Jay Leno’s Garage. He said it was a “a gift from Mr Robert Downey Jr."
Also, did you know it was Robert Downey Jr who convinced Chris Evans to sign multi-film contract with Marvel when he was almost on the verge of declining it. This friendship is for the keeps, right?
